UDLText.name: T

Method.name: OnPage
Method.Implementation:
#dim %request As %CSP.Request #dim %response As %CSP.Response
Set Method = $Get(%request.Data("method",1)) Set Text = $Get(%request.Data("text",1))
Xecute "do .."_Method_"()"
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: GetVARPARA
Method.Implementation:
Set pDescParametro = $get(%request.Data("DescParametro",1)) Set pExibirCod = $get(%request.Data("pExibirCod",1)) Set pOrder = $get(%request.Data("pOrder",1))
Set meuSQL = "Select SearchWord As Codigo, Text As Descricao From SQLUser.VARPARA " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Where Company = 0 And Language1 = 'PT' " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "And ParameterName = '"_pDescParametro_"' " If pOrder '="" Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "ORDER BY Text "_$Select(pOrder="DESC":"DESC",1:"ASC")
Set arrayRetorno = []
Set rSet = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",.meuSQL) While(rSet.%Next()){
Set listDados = {} Do listDados.%Set("Codigo", rSet.%Get("Codigo")) Do listDados.%Set("Descricao", rSet.%Get("Descricao")) If (pExibirCod = 1) { Do listDados.%Set("Descricao", "("_rSet.%Get("Codigo")_") "_rSet.%Get("Descricao")) } Do arrayRetorno.%Push(listDados)
}
Do arrayRetorno.%ToJSON()
Return $$$OK

Method.name: GetDescricaoVARPARA
GetWWW101
Method.Implementation:
Set pDescParametro = $get(%request.Data("pDescParametro",1))
Set meuSQL = "Select SearchItem, Text From SQLUser.WWW101 " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Where Language1 = 'PT' " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "And ParameterDescription = '"_pDescParametro_"'"
Set arrayRetorno = []
Set rSet = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSQL) While(rSet.%Next()){ Set listDados = {} Do listDados.%Set("Codigo", rSet.%Get("SearchItem")) Do listDados.%Set("Descricao", rSet.%Get("Text")) Do arrayRetorno.%Push(listDados) }
Do arrayRetorno.%ToJSON()
Return $$$OK

Method.name: GetDescricaoWWW101
GetWWW102
Method.Implementation:
Set pDescParametro = $get(%request.Data("pDescParametro",1))
Set meuSQL = "Select SearchItem, Text From SQLUser.WWW102 " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Where Country = 'BR' " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "And ParameterDescription = '"_pDescParametro_"'"
Set arrayRetorno = []
Set rSet = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSQL) While(rSet.%Next()){ Set listDados = {} Do listDados.%Set("Codigo", rSet.%Get("SearchItem")) Do listDados.%Set("Descricao", rSet.%Get("Text")) Do arrayRetorno.%Push(listDados) }
Do arrayRetorno.%ToJSON()
Return $$$OK

Method.name: GetDescricaoWWW102
GetINPARA
GetDescricaoINPARA

GetConvenio
GetINART

GetDescricaoINART
Method.Implementation: Set rDescricao = $$SQLGetDescricaoProduto^VARSQL(pCodigo,1) Return rDescricao

Method.name: GetINItemStatus
Method.Implementation:
Set meuSQL = "Select ID1, Description From INItemStatus" Set arrayRetorno = []
Set rSet = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSQL) While(rSet.%Next()){ Set listDados = {} Do listDados.%Set("Codigo", rSet.%Get("ID1")) Do listDados.%Set("Descricao", rSet.%Get("Description")) Do arrayRetorno.%Push(listDados) }
Do arrayRetorno.%ToJSON()
Return $$$OK

Method.name: GetINItemGroup
Method.Implementation:
Set meuSQL = "Select ID1, Description From INItemGroup" Set arrayRetorno = []
Set rSet = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSQL) While(rSet.%Next()){ Set listDados = {} Do listDados.%Set("Codigo", rSet.%Get("ID1")) Do listDados.%Set("Descricao", "("_rSet.%Get("ID1")_") "_rSet.%Get("Description")) Do arrayRetorno.%Push(listDados) }
Do arrayRetorno.%ToJSON()

Method.name: GetPlanoSaude
GetDescricaoPlanoSaude
Method.Implementation: Set rDescricao = $$GetDescConvenio^VARSQL(pCodConvenio)_" - "_$$GetDescPlanoSaude^VARSQL(pCodConvenio, pCodPlanoSaude) Return rDescricao

Method.name: GetWWW013
Method.Implementation:
Set meuSQL = "Select UserName, Name From SQLUser.WWW013"
Set arrayRetorno = []
Set rSet = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSQL) While(rSet.%Next()){ Set listDados = {} Do listDados.%Set("Codigo", rSet.%Get("UserName")) Do listDados.%Set("Name", "("_rSet.%Get("UserName")_") "_rSet.%Get("Name")) Do arrayRetorno.%Push(listDados) }
Do arrayRetorno.%ToJSON()
Return $$$OK

Method.name: GetMEDProvider
GetSalasAtendimentos
GetGrupoAgendamento
GetDescricaoGrupoAgendamento
Method.Implementation:
If (pCodigo = "") Return ""
Set objVARGrupoAgendamento = $Get(^VARGrupoAgendamento(0, pCodigo, 1)) Set rDescricao = $$$VARGrupoAgendamentoDescricao(objVARGrupoAgendamento)
Return rDescricao

Method.name: GetPaciente
GetPatientName
Method.Implementation: If (pidPaciente = "") Return "" Return $Piece($Get(^MEDPatient(0,pidPaciente,1)),"~",23)

Method.name: GetCentroCusto
GetWWW120
GetWWW100
Method.Implementation:
Set pDescParametro = $get(%request.Data("pDescParametro",1))
Set meuSQL = "Select SearchItem, Text From SQLUser.WWW100 " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "Where Language1 = 'PT' " Set meuSQL = meuSQL _ "And ParameterDescription = '"_pDescParametro_"'"
Set arrayRetorno = []
Set rSet = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect("",meuSQL) While(rSet.%Next()){ Set listDados = {} Do listDados.%Set("Codigo", rSet.%Get("SearchItem")) Do listDados.%Set("Descricao", rSet.%Get("Text")) Do arrayRetorno.%Push(listDados) }
Do arrayRetorno.%ToJSON()
Return $$$OK

Method.name: ToJSON
ToJSONBD
GetOrganizacaoNome
Method.Implementation: If (pCodOrganizacao = "") Return "" Set objOrganizacao = $Get(^FATOrganizacao(0, pCodOrganizacao, 1)) Set nome = $$$FATOrganizacaoNome(objOrganizacao) Return nome
